Class ScreenState

java.lang.Object
  ScreenState

public abstract class ScreenState
extends java.lang.Object

The ScreenState is an abstract class for the screens in the game.

The structure is according to the state design pattern.

Version:
March 2011
Author:
Marco Jakob

protected  GameScreen gameScreen
           
 
Constructor Summary
ScreenState(GameScreen gameScreen)
          Create a ScreenState.
 
Method Summary
abstract  void act()
          The act method is called by the GameScreen to perform the action in the ScreenState.
abstract  void initScreen()
          Initializes the screen.
